content: {"name": "Guttman Community College Campus Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Pantry is closed if collage is closed .\nStudents can take pantry for there family ..", "email": "", "url": "https://guttman.cuny.edu/students/connect-center/food-resources/#1604429535122-12cd539a-3f98", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "50 West 40th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10018", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7528932, "longitude": -73.9840589}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 313-8064", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "09:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "09:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "09:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "09:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "09:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Students & staff only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Student ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "If you prefer to pick up your packed items, email connectcenter@guttman.cuny.edu to request a pick-up appointment, at least two business days before you want to pick up. Someone from the team will confirm your pick-up date and time. You will be asked to complete a brief online form selecting the specific items you\u2019d like."}]}
